Title: Framed for Murder
Writer: John Banas (additional story editor), Chris Corbett, Kristen Dunphy (additional story editor), Kerry Greenwood (novel), Mia Tolhurst (story)
Actors: Essie Davis, Nathan Page, Hugo Johnstone-Burt, Ashleigh Cummings
Plot: A journey into the twilight world of silent movies. Hollywood has a stranglehold on the Australian industry and with 'talkies' on the way, the exotic 'Bride of Babylon' production is in ...
